alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 10:56AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nueces County through 1130 AM CDT... At 1055 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Driscoll Childrens Hospital, or over Corpus Christi. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Corpus Christi Country Club, Texas A&M University Corpus Christi, Bay Area Medical Center, Cole Park, Spohn Hospital South, Driscoll Childrens Hospital, Downtown Corpus Christi, Del Mar College Heritage Campus and La Palmera Mall. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 1 and 3. US Highway 181 near mile marker 648. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
